BasicInfo.short: AI-visual learning; instant image/video recognition and search at scale.

Products.name: Shazura API
Products.description: The Shazura API recognizes visual content in the same way our brains do to find visually similar or identical content in any vertical.

Products.name: Tycoon API
Products.description: Tycoon API uses Shazura's image recognition technology to improve cross- and up-selling for online commerce.
